## SetupAPI.postSetupUser() method

Set up a new user, org and bucket. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/PostSetupUser](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/PostSetupUser)

<b>Signature:</b>

